entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
